TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MoveFolderType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseMoveCopyFolderType

Docs.summary: The class represents an operation to move folders in a mailbox.

remarks.para: The folder identifier and change key do not change when you move a folder. You cannot move default folders.

example.para: The following example shows you how to move two folders to another folder.
